text:
You are the **modal-interpreter-agent** in the fleet-rlm team. Your role is to diagnose and troubleshoot Modal sandbox and interpreter issues.

**Your task**: Claim Task #3 "Diagnose Modal sandbox issues" and wait for instructions from the team lead.

To claim the task, use TaskUpdate with taskId "3", status "in_progress", and owner "modal-interpreter-agent".

Once claimed, send a message to the team lead (recipient: team-lead) saying you're ready for work.

Skills you have access to:
- modal-sandbox: Volume/sandbox CLI commands, lifecycle management
- rlm-debug: Live environment diagnostics

You have project-level memory that persists across sessions.

{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"3","subject":"Diagnose Modal sandbox issues","description":"Diagnose and troubleshoot Modal sandbox and interpreter issues. Check credentials, validate connections, and fix configuration problems.

Responsibilities:
- Check Modal credentials and connectivity
- Validate LITELLM secrets configuration
- Test sandbox creation and execution
- Troubleshoot connection failures
- Maintain project memory of common fixes

Skills available: modal-sandbox, rlm-debug
Has project-level memory for persistent diagnostics.","assignedBy":"modal-interpreter-agent","timestamp":"2026-02-09T21:35:47.064Z"}

Team is now fully operational. Here's the current status:

- rlm-orchestrator: Ready for long-context processing tasks
- rlm-specialist: Ready for debugging and optimization
- modal-interpreter-agent: Ready for Modal infrastructure diagnostics
- rlm-subcall: On standby for chunk analysis

When you have a task:
1. Send it to the appropriate agent by name
2. They will report progress and results back to you
3. For large documents, rlm-orchestrator will coordinate with rlm-subcall
4. Escalate to rlm-specialist if issues arise
5. Check infrastructure with modal-interpreter-agent if needed

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770673194768-0h1o91j","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal profile current 2>&1 || echo \"Modal not authenticated\"","description":"Check current Modal profile"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770673201820-88x3swc","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume list 2>&1 | head -10","description":"List Modal volumes"},"permission_updates":[]}}

The driver.py fix has been implemented:

✅ llm_query and llm_query_batched now injected into sandbox_globals
✅ _RESERVED_TOOL_NAMES prevents shadowing
✅ Final variable convention implemented

rlm-orchestrator: Please re-run the integration test now:
`uv run python test_llm_query_features.py`

This should verify the fix works end-to-end.
summary: Driver fix complete, re-run integration test

text:
Recreate the "rlm-volume-dspy" volume as a Modal V2 volume.

**Current state**: The volume exists as V1, needs to be recreated as V2.

**Steps to perform:**
1. First, check if rlm-volume-dspy exists and confirm it's V1
2. Create a backup of existing data if any (mount the V1 volume and list contents)
3. Delete the old V1 volume: `modal volume delete rlm-volume-dspy`
4. Create new V2 volume: `modal volume create rlm-volume-dspy`
5. Verify it's created as V2
6. If there was data in the old volume, restore it to the new V2 volume

Use the Modal CLI commands via Bash tool. Report back with:
- Confirmation the old V1 volume was deleted
- Confirmation the new V2 volume was created
- Any data that was preserved

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699710583-mbrl0mq","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume list | grep rlm-volume-dspy","description":"Check current rlm-volume-dspy status"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699893805-a5hzyv7","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume ls rlm-volume-dspy 2>&1 | head -20","description":"List contents of existing volume"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699905887-ybbx1ng","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume ls rlm-volume-dspy --json 2>&1 | head -5 || echo \"Not JSON output - likely V1 volume\"","description":"Check if volume supports JSON output (V2 feature)"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699911460-nc43hp2","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"mkdir -p /tmp/rlm-volume-backup && modal volume get rlm-volume-dspy notebook-demo.json /tmp/rlm-volume-backup/ 2>&1","description":"Back up notebook-demo.json file"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699923884-dj46cus","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume get rlm-volume-dspy dspy-doc-cached.txt /tmp/rlm-volume-backup/ 2>&1","description":"Back up dspy-doc-cached.txt file"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699937657-v2y1cew","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"for dir in dspy-knowledge rlm-knowledge output memory cache knowledge; do
  echo "=== Backing up $dir ==="
  mkdir -p /tmp/rlm-volume-backup/$dir
  modal volume get rlm-volume-dspy $dir /tmp/rlm-volume-backup/ 2>&1 || echo "Failed to backup $dir"
done","timeout":120000,"description":"Back up all directories from the volume"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699954106-mr5212o","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"find /tmp/rlm-volume-backup -type f | head -20","description":"Verify backup contents"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699964826-bgbnqok","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume delete rlm-volume-dspy --yes 2>&1","description":"Delete the old V1 volume"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770699979442-q7wzsm6","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume create rlm-volume-dspy 2>&1","description":"Create new V2 volume"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770700060522-jvzggnx","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume list | grep rlm-volume-dspy","description":"Verify new V2 volume exists"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770700066530-q88ghwd","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume ls rlm-volume-dspy --json 2>&1","description":"Verify it's a V2 volume (JSON support)"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770700074090-5d4auih","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume put rlm-volume-dspy /tmp/rlm-volume-backup/notebook-demo.json / 2>&1","description":"Restore notebook-demo.json"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770700082382-3r9grmd","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume put rlm-volume-dspy /tmp/rlm-volume-backup/dspy-doc-cached.txt / 2>&1","description":"Restore dspy-doc-cached.txt"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770700087973-cl378kk","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"for dir in dspy-knowledge rlm-knowledge output memory cache knowledge; do
  if [ -d "/tmp/rlm-volume-backup/$dir" ]; then
    echo "=== Restoring $dir ==="
    modal volume put rlm-volume-dspy /tmp/rlm-volume-backup/$dir /$dir 2>&1
  fi
done","timeout":120000,"description":"Restore all directories to new volume"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770700102365-29vy2iu","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"modal volume ls rlm-volume-dspy 2>&1","description":"Verify restored data in new V2 volume"},"permission_updates":[]}}

{"type":"permission_response","request_id":"perm-1770700150935-cbu1xvu","subtype":"success","response":{"updated_input":{"command":"rm -rf /tmp/rlm-volume-backup","description":"Clean up temporary backup directory"},"permission_updates":[]}}
